title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When attempting to use the dynamic text content type, it does not have any effect on the output.
OB: When I set the content type to dynamic text, the output remains the same and does not change according to the dynamic text content type.
EB: When I set the content type to dynamic text, the output should change dynamically based on the content type.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application 
2. Set the content type to dynamic text 
3. Observe that the output does not change based on the selected content type.
